title: Subchapter A - Procedures for Implementing the Standards of Incarcerated Individual Behavior
content:
Subchapter A - Procedures for Implementing the Standards of Incarcerated Individual Behavior

State Regulations

Part 250 - Scope And Interpretation Of Rules And Regulations In This Chapter (§ 250.1 to 250.3 to 250.4)

Part 251 - Cases of Incarcerated Individual Misbehavior (§ 251.1 to 251.7)

Part 252 - Violation Hearing (§ 252.1 to 252.7)

Part 253 - Disciplinary Hearing (§ 253.1 to 253.9)

Part 254 - Superintendent's Hearing (§ 254.1 to 254.9)

Part 255 - Miscellaneous Provisions

Part 256 - Alternative Disciplinary Resolution (§ 256.1)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
